resources.string: 1. You can text what you want to say and click the send icons to let Emit speak for you
2. You can adjust pitch and speed voice as you like
3. You can add a new note by click the add icon
4. You can edit your note by clicking the note you want to edit
5. You can delete your note by swiping it to rigth or left
6. You can copy the note description by holding the note for easy acces to what you want to say
7. You can delete all note you create by click the three dot icon above and select delete all note
